0: The rooms have all amenities one could want
The excellent breakfast is now squeezed into a 3rd floor resto so get there early to avoid being seated at some overflow tables in the hall
Also the hallways of the hotel were not air conditioned at all so every time I walked out of my room it was 85 F at least
The location is not ideal but not too inconvenient either waiting for taxis can be a bit of a bother as they do not come by so easily
No Bellboy help with the luggage
I would definitely want to stay there again when I go back to Bangkok
But 10 baht for a local phone call
They also puts a plantar in front of the mirror by the steps you use to get out of the pool
Travelling on the sky train to sukumvit area
1: Special thanks to club lounge members Nisara Donna May Mind Pom
On top of that the happy hour arrangement was great with lot of food especially the desert salad items
The hotels in house coffee and pastry shop
Knithimar straf very kindly with me and friend thank you na kub
Besides that the front desk was extremely helpful and concierge was top notch
Varieties of food selection very good quality grilled station is the best the meat is very tender Marisa and team service are excellent keep on checking us
The hotel is very good locate
The staff were very courteous pleasant and helpful
The breakfast buffet was expansive and tasty
